summary: A unit‑test suite that verifies the Qiskit DAG drawing utility, checking that generated diagram files follow naming rules and extensions, only accept supported drawing styles, correctly handle circuits lacking quantum registers, and accurately render DAG dependencies.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the DAG visualization feature in Qiskit, preventing regressions and providing confidence to developers and end‑users that circuit diagrams are generated reliably.
